title: Ultra Combo System
description: The complex advanced combo system for scripting the combat logic.
longDescription:
Quick:
  • Demonstration video and tutorial playlist> Youtube Link


(UPD - 2022)

I am happy to announce all my Unreal Engine content is free now!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

Latest info about content in the video ~ Youtube Link!

Please watch the video, it explains my current situation and info about support.

Also use the discord channel for any questions or support now ~ Discord Link!


About:

The complex combo system for scripting the combat logic, system can proccess input commands and chain them to different behaviors, should fit any kind of projects, fightings, actions, rpg, variations of usage are limitless, also includes hitbox/reaction and finisher systems with variety of usage.


Reaction system is used to provide different kind of reactions when actors receive hit/damage by combos, reactions can be scripted random, specific and prioritized, each combo can provide different reactions, and more.


Easy setup of hitboxes, without custom actors and inherited logic, the hit trace does include substep trace system, there will be no lost frames for tracing complex fast moving weapons and animations, hit detect can be used for any kind of weapon, character or object, it is also can be modified and changed on the fly.


Finisher system does include synchronized animation and event manager, pattern usage automatically detects nearby compatible actors to engage finisher, it can be used to create dynamic finishers with variables, like character defeats multiple enemies in cinematic way.


All systems are managed by one component, easy add to any character, system does include conflict management, everything can be prioritized.


Note:

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Complex Combo builder, with additional hit/reaction, finisher system all can work together or separately.
  • As single component, very easy to add to any player, or NPC, does not need any specific class to be created.
  • Does provide very deep condition system, any kind of behaviors can be added.
  • Includes movement management, no need to create multiple events to fix movement conflicts.
  • System is ready to use with any new characters and animations, no complex setups.
  • No limits in usage, any amount of input, combos and behaviors can be added.
  • Can fit any project type, very extendable and versatile.


Disk Size: 12.8 MB

Number of Blueprints: 3

Input: Keyboard/Mouse/Any

Network Replicated: No

Supported Development Platforms: All (Tested only on Windows)

Supported Target Build Platforms: All (Tested only on Windows)


New version is compatible with engine versions: 4.19.2-4.26

About version compatibility: The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Warning! Animations from demonstration are not included, they are from UE4 marketplace packages, the system does include free animation as example instead.

releaseInfo.releaseNote: 1.3, fix of leap enum and improved combo rotation modes.
